thread.title: ‘Rolling rooms’ offer cheap lodging, spectacular view in NYC (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: ‘Rolling rooms’ offer cheap lodging, spectacular view in NYC (VIDEO)

title: ‘Rolling rooms’ offer cheap lodging, spectacular view in NYC (VIDEO)
text:
‘Rolling rooms’ offer cheap lodging, spectacular view in NYC (VIDEO) Friday August 14, 2015 Print Article 
NEW YORK, Aug 14 — An enterprising New Yorker is offering overnight accommodations in a parked van or taxi, starting at US$39 (RM157) per night. — Reuters Entrepreneur John Powley has outfitted taxis, vans and campers with beds and parked them on a street in Queens, with a spectacular view of Manhattan's skyline along the East River. — Reuters pic More Stories for You:
